commit message: added layout inflating for port row

- wire up delete port button

trying to fix progress dialog issues
fixed force close when rotating screen while dialog was showing

when setRetainInstance(true), then savedInstanceState is always null.
store any values to save as member variables

store list of applications as instance variable instead of
applicationadapter since the latter has a reference to the activity
(context)

- fixed ports list getting cleared when rotating another tab twice
- made all fragments setRetainInstance(true)
- added input validation

- fixed some bugs
- started cleaning up knocker code
- cleaned up knocking error handlind & launching intent code

- lowered tcp socket timeout to 1ms to prevent multiple packets being
sent before a timeout

- fixed setting of default timeout value
- made default timeout 1000ms
- added determinate progress dialog when knocking
- no need to call notifyDataSetChanged when using adapter.add/remote

- removed positiononclicklistener

renamed drawables to use naming conventions
- dont set cancelable inside progress dialog fragment

- fixed rotating on host/ports tab clearing launch intet selection

also

- settings activity no longer uses deprecated method

- added a widget

- make clicking on widget do knock
- fixed all widgets getting updated to most recently saved host

- fixed clicking on widget always using the same pendingintent (knocking
for the same host)
- update widget with 'invalid host' when host is deleted
- added separate option to hide ports in widget
- fixed progress dialog max not always being set correctly
- added target port column for possible use
